)

putOrder
const putOrder = (
request,
response
) =>

Puts an order into the database.  Required query fields:

token

to authenicate the request

total

price

date

of the order in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS form

items

in [{"name": <name>, "price": <price>, "menu_item_info_id": <item id>}, ...] form

Parameters
request

HTTP request object

response

HTTP response object

addItem
const addItem = (
request,
response,
orderId,
items,
item
) =>

Recursively adds items to order after order has been created.

Parameters
request

HTTP request object

response

HTTP response object

orderId

ID number of order the items are to be added to

items

JSON array of item objects

item

index number of item to be added on current function call
